Reviews.Content: stayed hotel company conference generally big complaints check bit slow also wait quite wanted ask anything reception stayed older part hotel hotel split two part across road completely ideal room nicely decorated little small example couldnt wardrobe door open walk past case lot door opening closing didnt matter much hardly bathroom nice enough restaurant located building dress go outside go breakfast breakfast ok great evening meal one four course affair nights went one many restaurants nearby enjoyable meal location hotel pretty good near metro stop around 10 mins walk placa de catalunya bad base use sight seeing hotel facilities bar quite small lifts slow side internet access rooms whilst free slow almost point better conference room located top floor along rooftop bar terrace nice gave good views street also pool wouldnt exactly say designed swimming closed anyway hotel gym building fair better expected small adequate overall bad hotel looking somewhere essential facilities quite possibly better hotels close

Reviews.Title: “Polite, but entirely unprepared!”

Reviews.Content: great hotel amazing location 10 minutes walking away de next museum great st metro next hotel also tourists bus station important great found around line strongly recomended one well staff really kind helpful enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Perfect in every way”
Reviews.Author: Saffy101
Reviews.Content: hotel staff helpful rooms modern everything could think short walk away gaudis casa la pedrera bit longer la sagrada familia location couldnt better within couple blocks many restaurants chose cant forget mention great shopping area place well stay visiting barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Good location, confortable, but prefer the "old" building”

Reviews.Content: great location helpful friendly staff flight arrived really early let us room right away second time stay return barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional”

Reviews.Content: like hotel think location room size service good problem hot water 430 like shower wake early morning flight catch hot water time everything else good

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 days prior 2 days cruise referred hotel friends also stayed great location easy walk barcelona stayed building houses fitness room building directly across street rooms small compared us clean well appointed modern decide eat buffet breakfast offered several small cafes right around corner much reasonable also able arrange transportation airport hotel back airport end trip family 6 worked well

Reviews.Title: “Nice but quiet expensive”
Reviews.Author: Nexis69
Reviews.Content: hotel well situated metro station nearby sights within easy reach staff bar reception exceptional friendly helpful recommended

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely great location and high value”
Reviews.Author: mshbnyehud
Reviews.Content: far best located hotel everything rooms little cramped wardrobe door open cant get drinks extortionate grateful receive drinks voucher bar lacking since two us room assumed ordered round drinks discount would one hotel dont mean want anyone drink bar make affordable concierge extremely directions advice etc etc

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous hotel, great location!”
Reviews.Author: Kev_D13
Reviews.Content: go barcelona business quite often stayed condes hotel first time month ago hotel basically one best hotels ive hotel like 4 star hotels modern clean great breakfast huge variety food choose really makes difference staff hotel welcoming friendly making feel comfortable unbelievable definitely return hotel next future trips barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Attractive hotel in ideal location”
Reviews.Author: ddstrachan
Reviews.Content: stayed three nights last week sun 29 jan wed 1 feb part business trip definitely returning family hotel impressive 1 location superb 50 station right middle passeig de gracia 2 service excellent staff cannot enough help wherever encountered checkin restaurant etc genuinely wanted help cant everywhere like 3 rooftop area looked like great place warmer months hectic sightseeing bit cold use occasion 4 room clean spacious importantly bed comfortable bed linen high quality looking forward coming back spring

Reviews.Title: “great location”
Reviews.Author: gitsmuts
Reviews.Content: stayed one night hotel check process easy rooms spacious clean quiet mention affordable highlight 2 star michelin restaurant well hidden wine food service amazing portions small food prepared complex incredible

Reviews.Title: “Loved it! Great Location & Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: DeeSean
Reviews.Content: disappointed hotel worst stayed barcelona seem 2 went wrong one cross back road side staff extremely unhelpful level english quite low still smoking floors absolutely smell lift room dark dingy facing inner atrium bathroom dirty need refurbishment stay everywhere else full

Reviews.Title: “Sweat!”
Reviews.Author: heiranig
Reviews.Content: invited business held hotel hotel relatively expensive payed per night seems reasonable price position passeig de gracia walking distance famous gaudis sagrada familia also la rambla boulevard almost ideal rooms wide comfortable breakfast fine

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: safaris63
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel xmas new year 2011 pricing relatively high arrived full expectations excellent reputation excellent location right passeig de gracia royal hotel initial good hotel two buildings either side cross street passeig de gracia went wrong one course checking offered assistance transfer building initially room large location missing wall left wall mounted tv replaced deck mounted holes wall left bathroom cracked floor tiles dirty brown stains ceiling shower worst appeared someone opened bottle cava something similar wall behind bed stains running wall cleaning staff noticed cleaned either someone recently room maintenance hotel really photos points morning check complained condition room without question offered alternative room generally much better condition quite happy room although offered alternative without fuss receptionist person showed us alternative total surprise could unhappy anything room despite obvious problems another point contrast several hotels stayed close proximity reception door staff odd occasion door staff superior bar staff friendly turns classic read boring late design traditional like style exterior building like many barcelona hotels rooms one side street newer modern rooms side street 21 euros night extra whilst buildings interesting little anything remains interiors apart entrance hall one buildings overall initial change rooms room large boring design adequately comfortable would surprise classic rooms completely made long dont many hotel rooms vicinity even ones hotel across road public areas hotel exterior buildings interesting really quite lovely

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel”
Reviews.Author: redwallguy
Reviews.Content: company stayed hotel trip barcelona happy hotel rooms nice clean location fantastic service good restaurant superb one night people group dinner restaurant simply top amazing absolutely one highlights remember use terrace roof beautiful views city even see la pedrera

Reviews.Title: “3rd time - love it”
Reviews.Author: birdwins
Reviews.Content: second time hotel kinda disappointed rooms ok good value money mainly due great location de gracia service seem care much customers present behind desk stops seems go barcelona short weekend plan spend much time hotel alright im sure pick better place service show positive customer attitude

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!!”
Reviews.Author: Boo2211
Reviews.Content: stayed three times business trips hotel booked fact many meetings held might find surrounded large group bad thing aware two lifts small may wait long time annoying top floors location great seeing barcelona reach central sights foot including gaudi cathedral near metro line also bonus rooms fine try get one facing courtyard back ones front noisy biggest disappointment breakfast poor selection definitely worth didnt bother first morning

Reviews.Title: “Good location but it's not all that”
Reviews.Author: DucksManchester
Reviews.Content: nice hotel ideally situated enjoying barcelona booked last minute break couple days stayed newer section perfectly happy room service facilities staff pleasant would stay without doubt

Reviews.Title: “Great if you're only looking for spending nights.”
Reviews.Author: BirabanoR
Reviews.Content: travel barcelona frequently work 3rd stay hotel time new building standard rooms new part hotel well priced euro per night standard rooms adequate good beds basic amenities rooms street side quite noisy due traffic sound proofing windows seems poor breakfast quite good minor gripe frustrating able easily find power point room move side tables desk lamps find one power point

Reviews.Title: “Funky modern hotel, good service, good for high end shops”
Reviews.Author: 52traveller
Reviews.Content: rooms older part hotel beautiful newer section hotel directly across street much smaller rooms without character stayed older section room large clean balcony overlooking street two sets balcony doors one inside one road noise desk staff doormen accommodating one doorman wonderful spoke good english friendly helpful tourist information taxi stand right outside hotel easy get ride hoponhopoff tourist bus stop two blocks hotel neighborhood felt safe mind walking alone evening many good restaurants within easy walking distance tip rooftop lounge nice waiter rude much better places get drink tapas relax back barcelona definately stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Average in great location”
Reviews.Author: ryevrah
Reviews.Content: excellent location confortable rooms good steps away metro station walk distance plaza good option stay barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Roof Top Dining and Baroque Facade make for a unique experience!”
Reviews.Author: HPM1984
Reviews.Content: service hotel made might okay stay unpleasant travel agent booked us suite request thrilled entered room huge facing street great view problem sound proofing lots desk staff extremely unhelpful room change called travel agent based spain assistance called immediately manager came accomodating decided try 4 suites available us could change regular room anytime liked nite decide make change desk staff unhelpful finally got done room small overlooking ugly reception staff throughout four days huge effort look respond simple questions restaurant directions etc old building breakfast across street newer one breakfast buffet pretty particularly fresh location good would think lot better choices area fifth floor though many elevators spain tiny one worse walked stairs

Reviews.Title: “Great value but undersatffed”
Reviews.Author: yjb53
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights monument building sure old new location great walking around shopping high end designer stores true open window street traffic noise makes sleeping difficult close window turn air conditioning get peace quiet room decent size 1 person clean bed comfortable ordered room service one evening food pretty good green salad chocolate cake breakfast included corporate rate handled restaurant across street probably convenient breakfast selection fairly good although nothing get excited overall would say nice hotel

Reviews.Title: “the devil is in the details...”
Reviews.Author: fastiago
Reviews.Content: booked suggestion friend changed rooms twice good points location avenue lots high end stores lot see states awesome food choices multiple places door far enough away ramblas area bit hotel two buildings sort think place clean lobby bar pricey boring would go elsewhere given many choices large open terrace cocktail area 8th floor opposite building gives awesome view sagrada familia cathedral get first drink however basically forget expect get find server cant sit bar place expect room facing street corner property lots street noise de gracia major basically half rooms ones facing inner courtyard much quieter also hear subway underneath constantly higher floors problem low travel wake middle night light sleeper may upset change rooms twice third room able hear foot traffic case outside tv movie selections poor fair saw many hotels immediate vicinity would consider looking elsewhere shame place otherwise ok thats gave average rather good rating

Reviews.Title: “pleasant hotel in good position.”
Reviews.Author: rwh30960
Reviews.Content: recently stayed condes de barcelona one night departing cruise second visit hotel first time 2 years ago stayed old building time stayed new building found actually prefer old building charm lobby larger rooms buildings basically plenty room comfortable bed importantly cool air conditioning buildings roof top enjoy views without buy drinks entire staff friendly accomodating example arrived early morning wanted room sleep long overnight flight quickly checked greatly appreciated hotel paseo de gracia location wonderful plenty restaurants shops within close walking distance cab stop front hotel liked definitely would stay hotel

Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel booked royal stayed one night cruise checked gave voucher cruise man youll hotel across dont know difference reading reviews knew wasnt preferred location 1 night didnt ask anything available main hotel next morning called hair received asked shuttle told luggage needed put immediately needed bus asked received welcome packet front desk checked didnt receive stay cruise sure ask welcome packet overall wasnt impressed price paid

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous location!”
Reviews.Author: dsmith2976
Reviews.Content: spent three nights boarding cruise ship new building nice room

Reviews.Content: condes de barcelona actually split two buildings original condes side think others building direct opposite corner 30 seconds away fine hotel buildings small swimming pools bars food available although time visit work done side drink food available newer side better bar open late night wonderful views casa familia set paseo de gracia location couldnt possibly better shops sights within walking distance even nearer visited hotels times past though stay staff levels seemed cut back somewhat probably times point one person reception little annoying staff fact helpful attentive room view street lovely although maybe another money saving scheme toiletries bit spare two people showering twice day need one tiny bottle shower gel surprisingly hotel quality slippers bathrobe happy say wifi free always bed comfy great thin extra pillows available request eaten restaurant another visit good time didnt eat hotel cant comment food snacks pool good good hotel seemingly saving would recommend primarily position heart city away noisy frankly ramblas

Reviews.Title: “Cannot Beat the Location”

Reviews.Content: many new better hotels property 2 hotels outdoor pools small nice day room trip dark noisy worth upgrade get great price less 120 euros okay worth 200 euro night

Reviews.Title: “Great location, breakfast and service”

Reviews.Content: husband stayed end july year booked using website would also highly recommend got fantastic room rate arrival offered upgrade executive room per night usually euros per night upgrade room reception staff helpful friendly showed us room room fantastic huge room fact large dressing area full length mirrors bathroom nicely done shower amazing spacious powerful bath robes albeit large ones im provided toiletries bed incredibly comfortable big room full patio windows across shutters privacy view room centre courtyard wasnt amazing view honest staying maybe ask road side view location hotel perfect situated passeig de gracia stones throw away gaudis famous buildings roof top bar great views across city sagrada die spent week hired get us around city make journey beach easier hotel roughly 3 miles beach worth visit bike far could took ride tram takes top view incredible see across barcelona church beautiful theres top thats 100 years old discovered several restaurants time barcelona think worth mentioning side streets possibly wouldnt found normally discovered whilst around bike la lovely quaint italian food lovely especially staff friendly like indian food head calle food possibly best indian food ever eaten setting beautiful would recommend hotel thing wrong stay rooftop pool area wasnt open maintenance hotel two sides road two buildings another roof top pool could use

Reviews.Title: “Best location in Barcelona, centrally located”
Reviews.Author: MnJH5
Reviews.Content: stayed part european honeymoon location ideal really safe louis store across street definitely helped right 2 metro stops rooms nice adequate clean funny smell stay overall good area service also good maids bad front desk gentleman incredibly rude really tried make feel stupid knowing policy hotel whole reason calling downstairs ask questions would stay look options since better feel barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Mediocre at best, but great location...”
Reviews.Author: PharmaProud
Reviews.Content: husband stayed condes de barcelona hotel experience good location perfect situated de gracia avenue almost front famous la pedrera one best neighborhoods barcelona close shops restaurants touristic bus stop metro station spacious room comfortable bed europe nice hotel staff

Reviews.Title: “location is perfect”
Reviews.Author: bulinatanya
Reviews.Content: great hotel best location checking gaudi buildings

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel Experience”
Reviews.Author: Reggie2u
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights friend july barcelona many times specifically booked hotel pools anticipated spending time around unfortunately arrived advised 1 pools closed work done went deck pool told rude woman private couldnt use essentially area give furniture convention weekend guests could use area approx square ridiculous lot guests unhappy complaining people space around pool could squeeze complained front desk completely asked speak duty manager told wasnt next 2 days bottom line paying facilities couldnt use trying get drink ie spend money around pool difficult nobody answered phone call bar could hanging 10 minutes anyone picked room nice location good breakfast however stayed hotel last year would highly recommend staff hotel go extra mile clearly bothered giving guests good service therefore repeat business dont stay far better barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded our expectations”
Reviews.Author: MartinHardee
Reviews.Content: let said write terrible hotel really hotel two building main building updated room building small reception old room lucky first stay clean old room updated noisy old tv old old 3 starts hotel found hotel decide room near us moved main building update room nice decorated big tub shower private machine new lcd tv king size bed big closet really turn holiday degrees breakfast great high quality staff polite helpfull know english well small swimming pool roof location great 10 minutes walk 1 metro station plaza hotel located de lot expensive shops let hotel expensive price update room main building otherwise would go cheaper hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location, Standard OK”
Reviews.Author: memberRossonWye
Reviews.Content: ended honeymoon rooms joke looked upgraded room could see difference staff rude could answer questions hotels ammenities room waste basket days bedding stained

Reviews.Title: “Good Location!”
Reviews.Author: Chris5506
Reviews.Content: stayed one night leaving cruise hotel nice area town close sagrada block la pedrera local bus 24 stops across hotel goes park gaudi fan location fantastic also close enough walk la rambla happily far enough away chaos upgraded executive room found comfortable although cold modern lines decor match old world charm facade condes

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel in a wonderful city”
Reviews.Author: travel_diva_4126
Reviews.Content: always pity youre hotel offers much spend short time arrived 1000 pm left following morning talk room excellent smart modern spotlessly clean tv wifi actually worked good desk actually stay couple years ago useful know hotel two buildings one side carrer junction passeig de theyre id say one completely refurbished modern style visit prefer traditional ask building say wasnt paying cant comment value money looking bookingcom seem bit pricey name de barcelona ie 75 condes de barcelona sorry isnt interesting

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Bernsie01
Reviews.Content: husband stayed days visiting barcelona july 2010 little confusing two towers across street one another older building updated one first checked put us old building room without balcony even though specifically booked paid room balcony informed front desk told us booked night would switch us next day follow room older tower large clean dated pretty annoyed reservation wasnt front desk didnt seem apologetic either experience newer tower better room balcony requested beautiful view gaudis la pedrera room nicely decorated clean updated addition building much updated bottom line make sure get room newer tower youll happy

Reviews.Title: “If your on a budget this is an okay hotel but I put in the extra money to upgrade”
Reviews.Author: honestopinion43
Reviews.Content: stayed one night prior cruise departure complaints service desk allowed us check 3 hours early great recommendations dinner sunday restaurants barcelona closed held bags next day bit sightseeing reservations made online hotels website every request accommodated single beds balcony etc room small modern problem one night balcony real plus great photos see top sagrada would definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good, but could so much better.”
Reviews.Author: dennis045
Reviews.Content: condes de barcelona great location selected hotel cruise passengers checking day checked completely deal numbers people arrived 930am course expect room ready would ready returned place still mess entirely covered people standing line tiny lobby area room ready told would wait amount time unacceptable prepaid room expected able check check time given room room sparse clean lovely 1 hour 40 minutes later complaining twice finally got luggage let bring told dont key beginning get worried hadnt seen luggage 6 7 husband went finally luggage arrived staff generally polite number people coming going wouldnt stay

Reviews.Title: “Very nice modern hotel near Casa Mila”
Reviews.Author: MM_World_Travelers
Reviews.Content: soon entered room knew perfect spare modern design inside room beauty corridors inner courtyard room french windows balcony overlooked passing passeig de gracia noisy even window open bathroom bidet first time ever used one little lobby provided quiet coffee coke hotel quiet even though centrally located passeig de gracia real gem

Reviews.Title: “The Place to be”
Reviews.Author: claytonMelbourne
Reviews.Content: 3rd stay condes de barcelona location best shopping restaurants visits hotel confortable advise old building renovated rooms spacious better amenities pools small top buildings great plus center barcelona also nice bar near pool

Reviews.Title: “Superb location and plenty of style”
Reviews.Author: unclepat
Reviews.Content: never disappointed staying barcelona hotel condes de barcelona exception cab ride barcelona airport came around 20 euro checkin breeze room spacious modern feel hardwood floors room comfortable bed push button electronic curtains led private balcony top deck lounge great view city including sagrada familia wireless internet 6 euro charge one best things hotel location close everything worth seeing

Reviews.Title: “Simply lovely”
Reviews.Author: Nat25M
Reviews.Content: great location casa view room breakfast fantastic pleased hotel choice recommend

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous hotel with friendly, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: catlover34
Reviews.Content: hotel located great location however expensive looking place near gaudis buildings shopping areas stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location, very helpful staff. Good value”
Reviews.Author: rjr2255
Reviews.Content: hard get kind value high season barcelona perfect location perfect weather perfect service perfect room new building yes pool closed werent going use anyway room wasnt ready early checkin surprise walked around city 4 hours came back surprised us room upgrade executive suite huge terrace fantastic initially concerned possible noise traffic terrace doors soundproofed cant hear thing honest took afternoon noise late wake noise heaven terrace sunset wonderful albeit tad pricey drinks didnt breakfast reviews cost instead went across street coffee splendid coffee milk croissant 2 euros cant beat front desk service outstanding got us da italian restaurant street superb experience kudos condes de barcelona cant recommend

Reviews.Title: “Consistently good, smart chic hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: Damien_and_Kate_UK
Reviews.Content: stayed 10th wedding anniversary initial welcome right departure every staff member polite helpful rooftop terrace fantastic despite extremely busy staff rushed feet managed serve everyone professionalism great location exploring heart fabulous city would hesitate recommend hotel anyone planning trip barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Excellent spot in town, very friendly service, very nice rooms... I will recommend to all my friends!”
Reviews.Author: BuRcHiN
Reviews.Content: condes de barcelona comfortable hotel lovely roof top views de gracia rooms vary size style traditional modern room traditional one view interior comfortable bed staff helpful friendly hotel walk many key tourist sights neighborhood many high end stores cafes restaurants two restaurants hotel michelin chef

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: cb90
Reviews.Content: hotel ideally located across la pedrera walking distance ramblas lots shopping hop hop bus tour stops right front hotel rooms comfortable modern interiors reception concierge well informed city info

Reviews.Title: “Nice business hotel with excellent terrace.”
Reviews.Author: birddogilainen
Reviews.Content: booked hotel 3 months advance choice hotels available special birthday perfect book standard room quiet clean thought bit cramped upgraded room fab beds rooms comfortable hotel spotless staff reception bar could nicer hotel new old website bit confusing breakfast good included price sure worth per head extra good value food around pool closed due time year looks amazing cocktails roof top bar great start finish night right beside metro 10 mins stroll la rambla fab

Reviews.Title: “nice city, nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: bakkra
Reviews.Content: hotel condes de barcelona really great location explore city barcelona visiting business meetings booked hotel well advance also hotel 4 day meeting help moved room placed street side newer hotel building noisey wanting rest much possible moving rooms problem staff accommodating rooms fairly generous size however newer hotel room building found rooms shabby wooden floors design looked tired design delux room small balcony overlooking courtyard nice lack made far private bed 2 twins pushed together ideal couple found lack making facilities annoying want coffee morning wake breakfast really expensive unless included room rate 20 euros buffet also internet charge 16 euro per day wifi ridiculous teh use computer teh lobby 10 minutes 2 euro additional costs business internet coffee making breakfast charges make hotel far 4 star rating extremely expensive stay roof top bar opened week stay march nice much delivered would rate 3 star hotel max accommodation 5 star price

Reviews.Title: “Reality Hurts”
Reviews.Author: snackwell
Reviews.Content: arrived late monday evening showed room great location walk everywhere wanted beautiful hotel stunning location could paid 4 times coming back

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC”
Reviews.Author: rascotty
Reviews.Content: book executive room really could happier room great size good size desk free internet lovely balcony bathroom good size really enjoyed deep bath separate rain shower double sinks bed comfortable staff friendly next door great tapas restaurant could fault hotel

Reviews.Title: “Stay here, it's fab!”
Reviews.Author: sootycat31
Reviews.Content: stayed june 2009 august 2010 feb 2011 great time nice rooms great staff unbelievable location wonderful rooftop bar complaint need real free wifi offer one free password per day commercial people travel multiple husband laptop son stayed us ipad hotel wants use security network understand single password day guests free get program nonetheless love hotel come back

Reviews.Title: “Nice, comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: ImpressedofReigate
Reviews.Content: couldnt praise hotel enough every needed enjoy trip away location brilliant close walk shops various get afield many famous sight seeing lay right doorstep reach short underground journey away regard hotel sister hotel opposite lovely choice two pools one rooftop found great also rooftop terrace bar called jacuzzi facilities never run people ridiculously busy could really spend time enjoy bedroom bathroom facilities also spotless comfortable making stay even better included deal also breakfast nothing like spanish set day breakfast provided hotels restaurant located next door hotel something look forward every morning cant hotel enough barcelona amazing city hotel justice

Reviews.Title: “comfortable condes”
Reviews.Author: eime
Reviews.Content: got really good deal rooms hotel therefore worth paid however would dissapointed payed full price went january know season however closed pools open also refurbishment works one none really checked room reasonable size one end corridor bed comfy bathrooms however need updating tired best condition also warned stay front hotel spanish like horns disturbing

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, location not ideal”
Reviews.Author: wawa_maxmin
Reviews.Content: weve barcelona first time wife need perfectly located hotel good rooms yes hotel one looking spent time mostly exploring city hotel like apartment good enough us hotel touristic place gives feel youre returning home long tiring day stayed business room large enough clean sleep quality fantastic fell love pillows staff always help dont see presence want nice important advantage hotel location aware hotels near la rambla much touristic appropriate people like want live city like local thats hotels location magnificent youre close heart city bothered chaotic surroundings another plus 2 special restaurants 2 michelin starred chef must experience courses sum book room condes de barcelona explore city want good room stay

Reviews.Title: “Don't Be Fooled”
Reviews.Author: LoulouStAlbans
Reviews.Content: stayed new years eve day could dine hotel actually two buildings opposite sides street little taken checked big suitcases told walk across street building sign porter still pretty chaotic took design room really nice great bed electric proper separate shower cool bathroom dinner superb second night returned room dinner find water bathroom ceiling flooding floor bit moved small suite moving best hotel breakfast trip whole really good hotel bit times signs poor quality might age quickly

Reviews.Title: “ove the location”
Reviews.Author: Nikko001
Reviews.Content: went high recommendation friend got stuck room right near service elevator housekeeping center even though wed reserved six months advance room nice wifi really free given hotels business center joke overall looks like hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel ,great location , just don't be tempted to order a drink”
Reviews.Author: Dean Calculator
Reviews.Content: located shopping expensive shopping might add district passeig de hotels spanish exterior apparently former private villa guests special experience enter 3 meter high modern glass doors marble small reception area staircase heading second third floors right reception area reception concierge helpful group booking restaurants okay room main building comfortable duvet covered twin beds suppose could pushed together never tried internet connections fine shower area standard adequate full doors opened onto small balcony great dont mind city noise like people might however doors close room calm course always wear earplugs hotel might best guide health club annex building across street small decent equipment one party stayed annex building none charm main building according noisy moved across main building satisfied roof top bar annex building really nice view avenue playing two nights dinner drinks breakfast across street main building typical euro buffet small downstairs bar main building adequate much ambiance location superb service great rooms comfortable breakfast good enough dont stay annex building advice

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding accommodations, will stay there again.”
Reviews.Author: immerseyourself
Reviews.Content: ideal location beautiful hotel underground parking clean good room service nice bar free wifi hotel badly overall great value

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Tross9
Reviews.Content: great hotel think things wrong stay one breakfast worth price paid room service bit overpriced well wide variety places eat barcelona didnt really much standard room small bed huge location cant get better

Reviews.Title: “we loved it”
Reviews.Author: HKO
Reviews.Content: wife travelled barcelona period found hotel nicely located within decent walking distance la arrival asked would prefer quieter room back hotel general staff friendly especially helpful rooms clean tidy general pleasant hotel price

Reviews.Title: “Superbly located hotel”
Reviews.Author: TravellerWirral
Reviews.Content: pity stayed two years ago hotel returned great location paseo gracia time found uncomfortable room small decoration equally uncomfortable bathroom old towels poor value since room cost 200 also service

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Kasita
Reviews.Content: traveled alone celebrate daughters 21st birthday abroad barcelona condes de barcelona blocks school stayed week visited daughter attended perfect location sight see shop eat thus never bored also want mention condes de barcelona beautiful rooftop bar fantastic view city staff exceptional helpful especially appreciated everyone spoke english great experience

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant position, great facilities, good value”
Reviews.Author: harbottle
Reviews.Content: pleasantly surprised hotel rooms comfortable efficient clean housekeeping staff friendly roof top bar fantastic view especially night reception staff spoke english kind helpful location passeig de gracia perfect could walk restaurants cafes tourist bus gaudis apartment building negative cost using hotel computer printer would stay lovely experience

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Condes de Barcelona Hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: clare_marktaylor
Reviews.Content: want reviewers hotel excellent location one block casa three blocks casa stayed new building rooms clean pretty basic memorable features hotel felt bit overall wasnt able figure two elevators two nights stay appears stop feel like stopping however cannot better rooftop bar cool relaxed band great nights wouldnt recommend romantic getaway everything else good bet

Reviews.Title: “Modern, impressive and a great location”
Reviews.Author: mann82
Reviews.Content: stayed 6 nights business trip best time room courtyard street noise staff great helpful room comfortable large european standards would stay recommend anyone

Reviews.Title: “Overall very satisfied”
Reviews.Author: Bonnequin
Reviews.Content: location excellent rooms clean large easy walk nearby resturants shops metro stations areas beautiful view gaudis works block way hotel price reasonable upscale location

Reviews.Title: “Great location but sullen front desk”
Reviews.Author: iancSurrrey
Reviews.Content: condes de barcelona overall disappointment pick hotel placed meeting corporate travel management company hotel adequate certainly worthy rating assume ratings people suffer business travel much rooms sparse small fine bed ok pillows nice mattress ok ok bathroom lack plugs business travellers unfriendly staff system lousy food workout room filthy disgusting expect eating moment cleaning products available standard hotel impossible equipment using gym sister property next door way floor sauna room placed towel avoid walking dingy moved towel afterwards black recommend staying outside enjoying fantastic city drinking enough fabulous wine room return overlook

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced & smelly”
Reviews.Author: SeattleSlewSeattle
Reviews.Content: beginning like stay another hotel ramblas full lucky us condes perfect us location helpful staff god value

Reviews.Title: “It could be so good at the Condes”
Reviews.Author: Donnietraveller
Reviews.Content: nice hotel rooms little small nicely decorated great air conditioning staff friendly helpful food excellent spa services great hard day sight seeing nothing better snacks rooftop bar making dinner plans

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: likesnicethiings
Reviews.Content: modern hotel experience working internet showers comfortable modern decor amenities rooftop bar great view order drinks tapas surprise bill comes like needing call room service want ice balance would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Lydia45
Reviews.Content: really good hotel felt quite luxurious room looked onto main road casa fab view close paseo de gracia diagonal metro lines dont get cab airport get metro city map plan trip didnt cab 20 euros metro 10 trip pass 7 euros hotel good walk main night life however lovely roof top pool sun terrace good bar well however next time would book hotel gothic even hostel far much see amazing barcelona cant wait go back

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice rooms”
Reviews.Author: Travelbudfla
Reviews.Content: returned stay hotel whole experience room small comfortable downside looked onto light tower outside views air conditioning air breakfast buffet style expensive reception staff courteous helpful although experience surly waiting staff rooftop bar hotel reception small 2 lifts always working hotel great location gaudis la casa street passeig de gracia bus touristic stop couple blocks away good restaurants nearby dont think would return

Reviews.Title: “Good location, nice rooms”
Reviews.Author: GulfWanderer
Reviews.Content: 2 adults 1 toddler stayed hotel 3 days wonderful time hotel centrally located easily accessible airport took train centre great walking areas hotel actually two buildings across street room average size nice modern dark hardwood floors king bed full bathroom family suite included small corner main room toddler cot complimentary mini bar well staff friendly use restaurant night decided go tapas bar closed private function facilities cant comment overall liked hotel would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Good location but not safe in the hotel”
Reviews.Author: damed
Reviews.Content: arrived barcelona final leg spain vacation thoroughly impressed checkin smooth shown room immediately wonderful view city bedroom room modern comfortable elegant hotel perfectly located near two metro lines block casa stayed five nights satisfied inexpensive breakfasts walk block north wonderful bakery located corner rambla de catalunya carrer de wonderful

Reviews.Title: “Luggage Safe Room. Not So Safe! Be Careful.”
Reviews.Author: smokey936
Reviews.Content: stayed second part spain vacation free breakfast good fruit disappointment staying westin palace madrid first requested nonsmoking put us smoking room smoking couldnt move us right away stay room one night rooms small modern style showers half shower doors floor would get wet well anything bathroom counter showering two rooms get moved put us service stairs elevator became loud staff slamming doors talking loud would start end around 1030pm beds quite firm pretty good location great roof top would moved hotels first night paid full package would stay budget spend little money upgrade

Reviews.Title: “Bad service here”
Reviews.Author: chompere
Reviews.Content: first sight chosen well ok booked agency basic room 4 hotel looked onto brick wall seemed clean well appointed aware two restaurants get breakfast one cross busy four lane road section hotel difficult warm sunny morning would want stay winter breakfast fine better evening breakfast room becomes restaurant food excellent clearly restaurant side road star intended eat price restaurant basic restaurant standard could extra expense wrong hotel surface well appointed clean behind facade old building well system regularly old pipes bath however main reservation hotel staff hotel centre second largest city spain would expected better understanding english language staff especially reception level reported room serviced towels provided took 4 hours three telephone calls deal matter following morning management dealt matter appropriate manner upgraded better room staff member sent assist us move put surly rude provided help ever alone unfriendly response lack language skills many aspects hotel fine two parts across busy road helpful would say many hotels city charging similar prices offer better value money

Reviews.Title: “Nice bed and breakfast - but that's about the only nice thing!!!”
Reviews.Author: GemL_K
Reviews.Content: wife spent three days hotel super modern rooms four star amenities refreshing break less modern hotels stayed madrid bathroom huge bed comfortable balcony didnt much view didnt mind spent day sightseeing wanted comfortable room come back located blocks away metro train takes airport

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Condes”
Reviews.Author: 2moons02
Reviews.Content: comfortable well located hotel one stay back

Reviews.Title: “How do you say "unhelpful" & "unfriendly" in Spanish?”
Reviews.Author: Travelfor2GA
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel last week perfectly located heart city shopping street hotel annex street stayed fitness centre pool roof top bar stylish rooms nice lacking real wow factor restaurant absolutely superb 2 michelin star restaurant obviously cheap worth special occasion gripe front desk staff would definitely stay perfect base explore amazing city

Reviews.Title: “Plush hotel - work in progress-”
Reviews.Author: travelbug093
Reviews.Content: lovely pillow central many many shops near hotel staff helpful bit pricey lovely

Reviews.Title: “hit the jackpot with this hotel”
Reviews.Author: JessieDublin
Reviews.Content: thoroughly enjoyed stay condes de barcelona ideally situated transport facilities excellent 3 mins walk railway staff friendly helpful room excellent spacious clean large comfortable beds bit noisy overlooked main road soon got use worth views visit trendy roof top swimming pool must aware drinks may little bit expensive worthwhile experience plenty shops buy breakfast one 5 mins hotel called could get coffee croissants 23 euros hop hop bus stops close hotel ideal way getting around also enjoyed getting lift top familia cable car olympic stadium takes castle free spectacular views city would definitely stay next time visit barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Be careful”
Reviews.Author: Helena101
Reviews.Content: comfortable room overly plush quiet night across street la pedrera one block metro easy walk ramblas overall great value

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, Lovely building, Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: kittyhola
Reviews.Content: stayed part 4 night break partner like reviewers cannot find much fault hotel high quality hotel get pay location chic ambience quality slight complaint temperature control system room plus noisy corridor around 7am service lift going otherwise recommend views terrace amazing location superb great place come back day exploring city

Reviews.Title: “Gaudi-tastic”
Reviews.Author: Jimmy2Cool4Skool
Reviews.Content: stayed recently 4 days business found hotel upgraded slightly larger room nice added like toiletries robe slippers etc etc room spacious wooden floors nicely lit internal stone staircase attractive slight feel location excellent one better areas barcelona surrounded louis nearby breakfast poor excellent small bar stroll away called lovely fresh coffee b sinks bathrooms water giving blocked appearance nice c rooms otherwise good hotel ideal quick getaway enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel and location, but....”
Reviews.Author: JoJo_westy
Reviews.Content: stayed condes 4 nights november thought cheapest hotel paid location 15 mins las ramblas 40 mins beach went saturday sunday sunday weather 27 sat beach bar drinking lovely standard double lovely spacious lot bigger expected could done kettle cafes enjoy coffee great tapas close tapas 24 think called spanish pieces bread something top 2nd visit barcelona wont last definatly staying condes bar expensive hey

Reviews.Title: “Super clean hotel”
Reviews.Author: EastbourneGussie
Reviews.Content: condes barcelona good experience location right within walking distance catalunya las ramblas gaudi houses fantastic shopping restaurants room well equipped clean modern iron board room requested instantly brought breakfast full wonderful fresh fruits meats eggs expresso side bed hard would recomend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: GillianandJames
Reviews.Content: stayed part small group tour 14 people hotel nice location unbeatable things clean room well equipped cramped staff friendly always knowledgeable always effective business hotel internet expensive business corner joke

Reviews.Title: “Best Location - Lovely Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kazza78
Reviews.Content: lobby comfortable staff helpful location could better sightseeing especially gaudi sights walking around barcelona stayed wing liked lot dont miss roof top bar new building nice weather fantastic night pools real swimming minute

Reviews.Title: “Very lazy and unfriendly staff”
Reviews.Author: tjp1994
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel aug 25 2009 night leaving 12 day cruise arrived early morning tired front desk room ready us within 12 hour pleased us much arrived way ahead checkin time stayed old part hotel found charming room comfortable beds excellent air conditioner clean quiet plenty restaurants nearby within walking distance safe area highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Love the Condes in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: LondonSATraveller
Reviews.Content: boutique hotel located district 10 minute stroll main plaza outside old city start las ramblas pedestrian boulevard shops street street wonderful area explore best gaudi architecture block front door hotel rooms original building apparently hotel time property across street hotel clean quiet decor hotel elegant prefer decor ritz carlton hotel rooms nice sized facing interior room lacked view made quiet exterior city noise speak rooms nicely floors bathroom wood floors main area heavy high ceilings comfortable linens bedding lcd tv great efficient service front desk helpful dinner reservations recommendations exchange well negatives two pcs used web access free rooftop pool hey sit around swim mixed drinks rooftop bar quite expensive 12 eu recommendation enjoy free snacks order something soft enjoy view sun sets absolutely spectacular us hotel would considered gem special room rates try paying stay advance refund available kind like priceline

Reviews.Title: “Modern boutique hotel in a classic building”
Reviews.Author: NJ_Voyageur
Reviews.Content: really enjoyed stay hotel hotel actually two buildings one side street booked hotel first given room part hotel rooms renovated room ok really bathroom old especially bathtub shower fixed high wall could removed something really hate furthermore room overlooking street wonderfull view onto la pedrera however noisy especially early morning traffic decided change room 1st night given room another part hotel one completely renovated everything brand new bathroom new tub normal shower new room overlooking garden also nice view soooo quiet hotel location perfect two famous la pedrera la casa closest vicinity hotel actually situated modern street lined shops famous la rambla walking distance used metro locations close hotel sometimes used taxi expensive lobby building renovated rooms charm antique building see stairs photos tiny roof well deck also small many chairs convenient sightseeing continue tour city everything close building rooms nice roof bar staff helpful could use kindness problem city least speak english quite well fixed internet access nothing free charge didnt try restaurants roof bar would recommend hotel friends offers excellent value money

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel/Annoying Staff with Attitude”
Reviews.Author: PhillyTravelers4
Reviews.Content: hotel nice rocks location perfect

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Stay - Very Welcoming”
Reviews.Author: danni&dave
Reviews.Content: even guest hotel may go drink two marvelous rooftop terrace views la sagrada familia la pedrera paseo de gracia rooftops

Reviews.Title: “Very Unwelcoming Staff - Downright unfriendly”
Reviews.Author: simonjacob
Reviews.Content: opted design room clean spacious enough closet room couple 5 hangers 3 drawers come actually missed bathtub hard day walking city would nice feet rather take another shower room quiet facing back never heard people walking corridor neighbors thing hear neighbors bathroom card keys failed us four times stay staff pleasant accommodating pool show youre serious go around corner pay 25 euros use gym day didnt location hotel excellent gaudi buildings shopping fine dining breakfast 19 euros went around corner bakery freshly squeezed orange juice pastry coffee would liked closer metro stop quite long haul since spent time area pleasant quiet comfortable terrific bed

Reviews.Title: “If You Like Service With A Smile...Skip TRhis Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: ChicagoGuide
Reviews.Content: first time visiting barcelona hotel recommended friend must admit way beyond perfect location nice neighborhood walking distance must see suprised kindness staff helpfull professional nice rooms clean quiet room view street reasonable price im definitely going back hotel

Reviews.Title: “Dont plan to sleep in”
Reviews.Author: cyntia
Reviews.Content: really nice hotel great location friendly staff would recommend roof terrace bar views city views dont nightcap couple unless prepared part time writing leaving aside didnt affect opinion terrific city good hotel little noisy street location excellent would stay would nightcap one many fantastic restaurants rather hotel ps would recommend de tapas excellent lunch toward bottom ramblas

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: praktikalmagic
Reviews.Content: hotel nice modern design rooms clean toiletries also little bit small bathrooms nice clean reasonable spaces hotel two towers pool great relaxing fun night nice day sightseeing hotel located well gracia barcelona elegant avenue across street form one landmark la pedrera gaudi would recommend much dinner casual restaurant delicious typical dishes 2 streets hotel also elegant therefore expensive restaurant looking go night would recommend much club short taxi ride hotel

Reviews.Title: “Bueno! We loved it!”
Reviews.Author: ryssee
Reviews.Content: many great things say hotel location wonderful rooms modern nice beds comfortable staff helpful unfortunately saw 2 different nights bathroom would return staff kept place clean hotel quality think people wouldnt since come night saw one small one time made uncomfortable though keep mind thinking hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great for Families”
Reviews.Author: BunnyGirl1957
Reviews.Content: stayed 8 nights december 08 honeymoon good experience location walked sites subway block away everything else used bar good room service tasty prompt room clean wellappointed except hair conditioner wash clothes figured european way quiet nice got great rate 100 euros happy

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed Condes de Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: carmenne
Reviews.Content: would stay location excellent hotel clean big problems made uncomfortable first clear email needing one double one triple room three kids ages 15 14 12 arrived rooms wanted put extra bed double room one bed insisted clear reservation needed three beds fact email given option triple room two boys share bed double room opted triple finally squeezed extra bed small double room two beds email clear type room intended give us would ok turned extra bed incredibly uncomfortable could feel everywhere plus rather small 15 year old try switch beds 12 year old 12 year old could get sleep could fit 12 year old sleep much condes might imagine much fun day nights slept crack two twin beds made wonder could even suggested two kids share bed double room nights slept bed nights turned cot addition arranged leave tried book cab airport concierge told us wait later day needed larger cab 5 people standard ones hold 4 didnt go ahead book cab know concierge result almost didnt get cab pm concierge trouble making reservation fare completely different concierge told us dont mean lower expected sum right hand know left hand condes everything goes smoothly may nice stay possibility error much condes better hotel concierges excuse either reservations department didnt know concierge could training therefore didnt know way foot hip bed piece wood almost caused break one occasion hotel block didnt stay booked dates might worth looking considered hotel decided since december didnt want far away center things amazingly prices seem roof also considered hotel good location across cathedral read rooms little tired course little tired time left condes

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: The_O'Reilly_Family
Reviews.Content: arrived directed us underground complimentary parking located conveniently hotel took us 20 minutes check long rooms nice modern probably great views city bathroom spacious comfortable complete amenities careful shower takes second figure entire bathroom floor bar pool roof bar great fantastic views city including gaudis buildings great small small top dirty didnt even put foot breakfast buffet nicely organized several hot dishes everything else might enjoy morning like scrambled eggs smoked salmon hot cappuccino would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Not overly impressed”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: second time stayed hotel disappointed last time two years ago stayed centre building time monument building two although reception common parts monument building better larger rooms direct access roof top bar pool make centre building better choice position across road gaudis la pedrera absolute must visit stylish passeig de could better staff helpful rooms high quality small roof terrace pool top monument building bar room service floor centre building across road wonderful cool roof top bar small pool breakfast extra quite expensive numerous places within five minutes sample cafe culture really stylish place base many sights walking distance close major hub metro system

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: preppride1798
Reviews.Content: wife stayed august hotel excellent perfectly placed central sightseeing shopping short walk ramblas quiet enough get good nights sleep staff extremely helpful friendly one plus superb rooftop terrace bar pleasant way start evening superb city rooftop pool areas small providing choose time carefully beds free towels pool jacuzzi breakfast good try get included room rate two quite pricey well worth service ac cleanliness superb rooms spacious well appointed would go back would recommend hotel people wanting superb base part town

Reviews.Title: “Disappionted”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: stayed condes april 2008 honestly say could fault hotel stayed new part hotel modern clean contemporary room fantastic probably largest bed slept fantastic bathroom huge walkin shower thing impressed balcony large view passeig de gracia location excellent upmarket area minutes away great landmarks city tour bus stop staff helpful could enough professional welcoming fault could state slight sewer smell corridor particularly mid afternoon fairness find many european hotels tend suffer add smell bedroom affect stay much would recommend hotel anyone wanting special stay barcelona
